item.description:
Pandemonium Books & Games in Cambridge, MA is hosting the Worldwide Dungeons & Dragons Game Day.

Bring your friends and join in the fun as we celebrate the release of Monster Manual 2. Here's a quick description of the adventure:

Journey Through the Silver Caves - a kobold wyrmpriest has stolen an ancient book of prophecy from the people of Alburia, a fortress on the borderlands. The kobold has a dark plan for the book - and only you can stop him in time!

The adventure will be about 3 hours long, and comes with 5 5th-level pregenerated characters.

You can sign up for slots at http://www.warhorn.or...

We're still looking for DMs, so if you'd like to volunteer, please contact Andy at aethan@bloopwatch.org

PLEASE NOTE: RSVPing here does not guarantee you a slot. Please sign up via the process listed above.
